Interface Clock

public interface Clock
A 24 hour clock that can have its hour, minute, and second set and read.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    getHour()
    Returns the current hour of this clock.
    int
    getMinute()
    Returns the current minute of this clock.
    int
    getSecond()
    Returns the current second of this clock.
    void
    reset()
    Resets this clock to midnight, 0:0:0
    void
    setHour(int hour)
    Sets the hour of this clock.
    void
    setMinute(int minute)
    Sets the minute for this clock.
    void
    setSecond(int second)
    Sets the second for this clock.
    void
    setTime(int hour, int minute, int second)
    Sets the time to a new hour, minute, and second.
    String
    toString()
    Returns the current time as a String, in the form hour:minute:second.

  • Method Details

    • setTime

      void setTime(int hour, int minute, int second)
      Sets the time to a new hour, minute, and second. If any parameter has an invalid value, zero is used instead.
      Parameters:
      hour - the new hour
      minute - the new minute
      second - the new second

    • setHour

      void setHour(int hour)
      Sets the hour of this clock. If the specified second is less than 0 or greater than 23, the hour is not changed.
      Parameters:
      hour - the new hour

    • setMinute

      void setMinute(int minute)
      Sets the minute for this clock. If the specified minute is less than 0 or greater than 59, the minute is not changed.
      Parameters:
      minute - the new minute

    • setSecond

      void setSecond(int second)
      Sets the second for this clock. If the specified second is less than 0 or greater than 59, the second is not changed.
      Parameters:
      second - the new second

    • reset

      void reset()
      Resets this clock to midnight, 0:0:0

    • getHour

      int getHour()
      Returns the current hour of this clock.
      Returns:
      the current hour

    • getMinute

      int getMinute()
      Returns the current minute of this clock.
      Returns:
      the current minute

    • getSecond

      int getSecond()
      Returns the current second of this clock.
      Returns:
      the current second

    • toString

      String toString()
      Returns the current time as a String, in the form hour:minute:second. For example, midnight is 00:00:00. Another example: 12 minutes and 7 seconds past 1 PM would be 13:12:07.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      This clocks time in the format h:m:s
